author: Staff Reporter
text:
A weekend short-term course in Healthcare Management will be offered by Deepam Hospitals in collaboration with the Commonwealth Science and Technology Academy for Research from March 19.

According to a press release, the course will impart management skills to healthcare professionals with comprehensive grounding in healthcare management to enhance their entrepreneurial skills.

Persons in the healthcare industry, who want to move to a management position from their current positions in the sector can attend the course.

It will also be useful for graduates who want to have an overview of the healthcare industry, the release said. .

For further details, interested persons can contact A. Mahalingam, COO, administration and academics, Deepam hospitals at 97104 85295. Alternatively, they can send an email to2525india@gmail.com
title: Course on healthcare management from March 19
